Our Mission

Labor Tubs Northwest delivers birthing tubs to hospitals, birth centers and homes throughout the Greater Seattle Area. Our comprehensive service includes on-call 24-hour delivery, set up, and phone support, as well as tub removal. We also offer self-service options for clients planning a home birth.

Peace of Mind

For over 17 years, Labor Tubs NW has focused exclusively on providing tubs for labor and birth. Our protocol for cleaning and disinfecting has been approved by many local hospitals, including Evergreen, UW, and Group Health.

Our tubs are specifically designed for labor and birth. They are deep enough to provide buoyancy and large enough to accommodate two adults and a variety of labor positions. We provide all necessary equipment.

Rental Options

Full Service Rentals are delivered to homes and hospitals. They include around-the-clock delivery, set up, phone support, and tub use, as well as pump- out, cleaning, and removal of tub. Extended rentals are also available, set up by appointment 1 â€“ 3 weeks before your due date.

Self-Service Rentals provide all the equipment you need to set up, use, and pump out the tub yourself at home. Clients pick up and return the tub at a convenient location in North Seattle, Tacoma, or Bellevue.

Reservations

After we have information about your birth plan, we will send you a reservation packet and contract. We recommend reserving at least four weeks before your due date for a full service tub delivery and six weeks before your due date for a self service tub.

*We will gladly expedite and accommodate last-minute reservations as tub availability allows.*
